thread.title: Oscars afterparty will serve more than 50 decadent dishes | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Oscars afterparty will serve more than 50 decadent dishes | Daily Mail Online

author: Karen Ruiz For Dailymail.Com
title: Oscars afterparty will serve more than 50 decadent dishes | Daily Mail Online
text: Gold-dusted popcorn, lobster corn dogs, 2,375 pretzels and 15 pounds of truffles: What celebrities will be eating at the post-Oscars party About 32,000 plates will be served at this year's Oscars after party, the Governor's Ball Celebrity chef Wolfgang Puck revealed decadent menu items such as baked potatoes with caviar, gold-dusted popcorn, and short rib topped with a Parmesan funnel cake About 1,500 bottles of champagne will be popped and each guest will take one home which will be served in a limited edition magnum bottle The chef's black truffle chicken pot pie is said to be a hit with celebrities such as Barbra Streisand
